name: Memory battle (itch) (DMAJones)
description:
Controls: 
A-Left
D-Right
Mouse-Aim
Space-Jump
Left click-Shoot

Feature:

can only shoot while standing still.

stop enemy's from entering your base (trench)

don't die (when enemy's collide with you)

win by killing 55 enemy's

gets harder at 10 points and 20 points

External sprites used:

Old man-https://www.spriters-resource.com/pc_computer/owlboy/sheet/84735/

Solider-https://www.spriters-resource.com/nes/totalrecall/sheet/85018/

both external sprites used, were edited by us.

Creators:

Dylan. Aspinall-Jones

Jack. Catchpole
